1367150.name: Kingdom Under Fire: Heroes Soundtrack
1367150.description:
Blueside is proud to present the official soundtrack of Kingdom Under Fire: Heroes to all Steam owners of the cult action-strategy classic.




Enjoy a second serving of the heaviest tunes this side of Hexter, featuring [number] guitar-grinding original tracks for the game. The perfect accompaniment to any orcish cavalry charge, elven infantry scrum or just a wild night out. A fine addition to any aspiring dark lord’s music collection.


The official soundtrack is free to download for all owners of the game.
